casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Peck, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as State ex rel. Peck v. Indus. Comm. (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 228.]

(No. 99-1024 Submitted February 8, 2000 Decided March 22, 2000.) Philip J. Fulton & Associates and William A. Thorman III, for appellee. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Thomas W. Atzberger, Assistant Attorney General, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Cook, J., dissents.
